description:
Finished Adding ALL vocals and changed to violin because of lower notes. Corrected Pre-Chorus vocals and slight vocal variation in the second verse and also chorus.
Added note on descending riff: https://youtu.be/DfP8Q7Pqzt4?t=32
Reworked all pre-choruses which I had not done before: https://youtu.be/DfP8Q7Pqzt4?t=62
Added Palm Mutes on tails in Chorus and cleaned up 6 string track: https://youtu.be/DfP8Q7Pqzt4?t=72
Edited Rests to dead notes: https://youtu.be/DfP8Q7Pqzt4?t=141
Corrected note pattern in the Bridge: https://youtu.be/DfP8Q7Pqzt4?t=169
Lined up timing with instruments on the "Triplet Riff": https://youtu.be/DfP8Q7Pqzt4?t=189
Fixed outro bar going back to 4/4 when its 5/4: https://youtu.be/DfP8Q7Pqzt4?t=347
title: Pareidolia

description:
- Added Vocals Partially (All the choruses, and all the verses I believe)
Missing vocals: Bridge, Solo, Triplet Riff Section
If anything I probably will work on it next week.
- Added Voice Ahhs missing in Chorus
- Fixed Bass Outro Effect playing the opposite harmony
- Fixed one part where the 6 string was missing a riff
- Fixed Post solo
Notes: I will remove ALL repeats next revition. Why? 1. Songsterr glitches out with repeats on renders sometimes. 2. Vocals end differently everytime. If I use alternate endings, it will also have a possibility of glitching out the tab itself on songsterr. Songsterr has a very tedious player...

This tab is looking more and more like the song completely. Hopefully Coming Home can be done next when I am finished with Pareidolia.
title: Pareidolia

description:
- Small fix on the bass outro effect
- Volume fade out to the end, hopefully songsterr recognizes it (it seems to recognize some volume dip)
- Added tied notes to Piano 1
on that topic, Piano 1 is corrupted and even making a new track didn't help, so Opening the tab in gp5 WILL crash/halt the program. Tuxguitar works fine but its Piano 1. If you remove it, the tab's outro works.
title: Pareidolia
